name: Just Chill 佛系运动 VR
name_original: Just Chill 佛系运动 VR
description:
"Work is so tiring...I want to lie down"
"Please lay me down, okay!!!"
Floma Game Studio is formed by a group of post-95s who feel introverted everywhere, this is what we want to say from the heart, so we have created a computer world centered on you, you will be the avatar Master of the world you live in. From the moment you smash the screen and fall into the computer world, you will see a computer world that is completely different from your impression of cold and mechanical. All the props are set like natural life, full of strong oriental charm, everything The rhythm is very slow. Next, you need to swim in the regular motion of the computer world, find the bug and release it, defeat it, and successfully return to the real world...

main features:
Unique art style: The underlying principles of redesigning the computer under the oriental soft and soft aesthetic core are used as game elements, such as computer task flow, BUG, ​​CPU, etc., they will be transformed into forever rolling, convoluted with many program blocks. Streams, aggressive procedural levels, CPU holes that can handle everything...
· Easy and fun gameplay: You will follow the changes in the space setting and use different movement methods, you will walk in the real world, and you will also swim in the virtual space; at the same time, you will also feel the charm of Chinese culture-Tai Chi Chuan And use this kind of oriental power to defeat BUG.
· Immersive sensory experience: In the game, you will experience a full range of sensory experience, not only excellent visual and auditory responses, but also a familiar cognitive experience in the real world. All designs will make you feel Immerse yourself in it and put your whole body into it.
· Novel game background: The underlying operating logic of the computer has been used many times in the story creation of the film industry, but the application of games is very rare. So we decided to translate the logic behind the computer into a game for the first time, so let's look forward to it together!
